      • connect

        public RmiServerInterface connect​(java.lang.String ip,
                                  java.lang.String port)
        A function to connect the Administrator console to the running RMI server. It tries to connect to a running RMI server within a gap of 3s repeatedly
        Parameters:
        ip - RMI IP address
        port - RMI port
        Returns:
        RmiServerInterface object if connection is successful (reconnection < 30s), null otherwise

        Parameters:
        server - RmiServerInterface object corresponding to the primary RMI server
        endedElections - CopyOnWriteArrayList of all ended Elections
